heroSubtitle: Igniting the passion for automotive excellence.
premierCompetitionText: The Bangladesh Automobile Olympiad is a national platform for students to showcase their knowledge, skills, and passion for the automotive industry. Compete with the best, learn from experts, and kickstart your career in automobiles.
showcaseSkillsText: Demonstrate your expertise in automotive engineering and technology.
winPrizesText: Compete for scholarships, internships, and other valuable prizes.
networkExpertsText: Connect with industry leaders, professionals, and fellow enthusiasts.
news1Summary: Join our workshop to learn about the latest advancements in engine technology from industry experts.
news2Title: Registrations for the National Olympiad Now Open
news2Summary: The registrations for the most awaited automobile olympiad are now open. Register now to participate and win exciting prizes.
news3Title: A Look Back at the 2024 Olympiad
news3Summary: A recap of the exciting events and winners from the 2024 Bangladesh Automobile Olympiad. See the highlights and get ready for this year.
aboutUsText: The Bangladesh Automobile Olympiad is a prestigious national competition that brings together the brightest young minds with a passion for automobiles. Our mission is to promote education and innovation in automobile technology among students across the country.
ourVisionText: To be the leading platform for identifying and nurturing future leaders in the automotive industry of Bangladesh.
ourMissionText: To organize a fair and challenging competition that tests the practical and theoretical knowledge of participants and to foster a spirit of sportsmanship and collaboration among students.
getInTouchText: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have a question about the event, registration, or anything else, our team is ready to answer all your questions.
